lines.text: Could've been a suicide, I guess...
With what? There's no bloody murder weapon anywhere.
Maybe at the bottom of that tub of concrete?
He died pretty far away from that, though. How'd it get over there?
You think he'd be able to make that shot from all the way over there... while bleedin' out from the chest?
...So maybe the <c=#0000FF>Stop Wizard</c> helped dispose of it.
And you don't have a motive for suicide, either.
